Job DescriptionPassionate about building a world-class information security program to safeguard a global tech company from the latest cyber threats and meet challenging security and compliance requirements? Arm is seeking a passionate, expert project manager to work across our business as we grow our program.About the role The Enterprise Security Project and Remediation Manager is an awesome opportunity for a project professional who loves to get things done, while making a major impact. It's the right role for someone who wants to grow their security knowledge. This role requires passion, grit, persistence, initiative, drive, and finesse. Arm's Enterprise Security team has an ambitious agenda. This role will drive several initiatives across the team, will direct and facilitate teams across the company to attain security goals, and will play a major role in keeping the program on track. You will utilize project management processes and methodologies to ensure the suite of projects are delivered on time, within a set budget, to high-quality standards, and meet customer expectations. You will be a key team player within a global team including Information Security, Engineering, IT, Internal Audit, Communications, Operations and various Arm vendors to deliver on the program's objectives.  You are mature and confident in your information security knowledge and will have excellent Project Management experience.  You will travel ~15%.
